channel.title: Griefing my house
channel.description: This is like the third time this week I have gotten griefed. I checked the locked chests they put and their name is ÿÿ. Is there any way to get my house turned into a private area like spawn?

item.title: Griefing my house
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No, we aren’t protecting any areas like that. But really, it’s your fault for building RIGHT outside of spawn (and putting diamond blocks on your house…)

I roll back their changes and ban them because it is griefing, but you are somewhat asking for it.

Read full topic
